platform.flamingo.themes.home.title=Themes for Flamingo platform.flamingo.themes.home.currenttheme=Current Theme platform.flamingo.themes.home.otherthemes=Other available Themes platform.flamingo.themes.home.warningOldColorThemeInstalled=This is the application to manage the Flamingo Themes. A Flamingo Theme is a customizable variation of any skin based on Flamingo. If you want to manage Color Themes for Colibri-based skins, you should go to {0}Colibri Color Themes Application{1}. platform.flamingo.themes.home.warningCurrentOldColorTheme=The current Theme is a Colibri Color Theme which is not optimized to work with a skin based on Flamingo. We have made our best to make it compatible, but the results might not be optimal. platform.flamingo.themes.home.useThisTheme=Use this Theme platform.flamingo.themes.home.newThemeName=Theme name... platform.flamingo.themes.home.create=Create new Theme platform.flamingo.themes.home.create.invalid=Invalid Theme name! platform.flamingo.themes.home.create.csrf=For security reasons, please confirm that you want to create a Theme called "{0}". platform.flamingo.themes.home.create.confirm=Confirm platform.flamingo.themes.home.set.success=Theme set to "{0}". platform.flamingo.themes.title.variables=Variables platform.flamingo.themes.title.preview=Preview platform.flamingo.themes.autorefresh=Auto refresh platform.flamingo.themes.refresh=Refresh platform.flamingo.themes.refreshwarning=The refresh can take several seconds. platform.flamingo.themes.loading=Loading... platform.flamingo.themes.category.logos=Logos platform.flamingo.themes.category.base-colors=Base colors platform.flamingo.themes.category.typography=Typography platform.flamingo.themes.category.forms=Forms platform.flamingo.themes.category.buttons=Buttons platform.flamingo.themes.category.tables=Tables platform.flamingo.themes.category.navbar=Navigation Bar platform.flamingo.themes.category.dropdowns=Drop downs platform.flamingo.themes.category.panels=Panels platform.flamingo.themes.category.breadcrumb=Breadcrumb platform.flamingo.themes.category.advanced=Advanced platform.flamingo.themes.defaultvalue=Default platform.flamingo.themes.lessCode.description=In this field, you can directly write LESS code that will be added into the skin. platform.flamingo.themes.incompatiblebrowser=Sorry, the preview does not work with this version of Internet Explorer. You need to use a more recent browser. platform.flamingo.themes.local=Local platform.flamingo.themes.global=Global
